trans-unit.source: Specifies a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> as the parameter to be used for hit testing a visual tree.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> como parâmetro a ser utilizada para acessos testar uma árvore visual.

trans-unit.source: With the GeometryHitTestParameters class, you can use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> value for hit testing, to determine whether any visual object intersects with the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> value.
trans-unit.target: Com a classe de GeometryHitTestParameters, pode utilizar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>para acessos de teste, o valor para determinar se qualquer objeto visual intersetar com o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>

trans-unit.source: You can also hit test with a <xref:System.Windows.Point> value by creating a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestParameters> object.
trans-unit.target: Também pode clicar em teste com um <xref:System.Windows.Point>valor através da criação de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestParameters>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestParameters> </xref:System.Windows.Point>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] hit testing only considers the filled area of a geometry during a hit test.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] apenas a testar acessos considera a área de uma geometria manchas durante um teste de acessos.

trans-unit.source: If you create a point <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>, the hit test would not intersect anything because a point has no area.
trans-unit.target: Se criar um ponto de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>, o teste de acessos seria não intersect nada porque um ponto não tem nenhum área.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters"></xref> class, using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters"> </xref> classe, utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> value to use for the hit test geometry.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> valor a utilizar para a teste de acessos de geometria.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> that defines the hit test geometry for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> da geometria de acessos de teste que define para este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> that defines the hit test region.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> que define a região de acessos de teste.
